Name: Perso
About the game: Perso is an atmospheric puzzle game. Collecting relics within each level will slowly reveal what and where you are. You will be in control of at least five cubes, each with different abilities. Use them all to find your way. You will need to approach each level in different ways to solve the puzzle. Changing your direction will change the layout of the world, opening up pathways or letting you fall. Take control and use all of your abilities to find new ways of staying alive. Collecting the relics in each level is your goal. These relics will ultimately lead you to a decision.
